body:
> Couldn't this be done by adding a bucketSample call in the filter expression? This allows us to make a simpler UI, but I think it is more complex overall and hard codes logic that could be expressed easily in JEXL expressions.

It could. I forgot that, since we added `ratioSample`, that the recipe doesn't require the `bucketCount` argument to do branch selection anymore.

We might want to add a simple-filter-esque field for this kind of sampling to make the UX better in the future, but for the first few preference experiments, this will be fine.
